resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."
"Changes in this release can be found in the app information, under “New Features”."

string-array.name: new_release_title
string-array.item: "Immediate Display of Vaccination Status for Recovered Persons"

string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: "As the organizer of an event, you can now – when instructed to do so by the public health authorities – warn your guests on behalf of someone who has been diagnosed with coronavirus and who attended the event, but was not checked in with the Corona-Warn-App."

"The Corona-Warn-App now displays full vaccination protection for recovered persons directly after the first vaccination. The two-week waiting time is waived for all vaccines except Johnson & Johnson."
